{
    "authority_id": "AuthID{{$randomInt}}",
    "scope_note": "Scope Note",
    "source": "{{SUBJECT_SOURCE}}",
    "jsonmodel_type": "subject",
    "publish": true,
    "terms": [
        {
            "term": "{{SUBJECT_TERM}} Term 1",
            "term_type": "{{SUBJECT_TERM}}",
            "jsonmodel_type": "term",
            "vocabulary": "/vocabularies/1"
        },
        {
            "term": "{{SUBJECT_TERM}} Term 2",
            "term_type": "{{SUBJECT_TERM}}",
            "jsonmodel_type": "term",
            "vocabulary": "/vocabularies/1"

    ],
    "external_documents": [
        {
            "title": "External Document Title",

        }
    ],
    "metadata_rights_declarations": [

        {
